payload.content: To understand Bill Gurley's AI thesis, one should watch his 14-minute presentation on the Tim Ferriss YouTube channel.

name: To understand Bill Gurley's AI thesis, one should watch his 14-minute presentati
content: To understand Bill Gurley's AI thesis, one should watch his 14-minute presentation on the Tim Ferriss YouTube channel.

payload.content: Bill Gurley is a general partner at Benchmark, a prominent venture capital firm in Silicon Valley.

name: Bill Gurley is a general partner at Benchmark, a prominent venture capital firm
content: Bill Gurley is a general partner at Benchmark, a prominent venture capital firm in Silicon Valley.

payload.content: Bill Gurley has authored a new book titled 'Runnin’ Down a Dream: How to Thrive in a Career You Actually Love'.

name: Bill Gurley has authored a new book titled 'Runnin’ Down a Dream: How to Thrive
content: Bill Gurley has authored a new book titled 'Runnin’ Down a Dream: How to Thrive in a Career You Actually Love'.

payload.content: Tim Ferriss is recognized by Fast Company as one of the 'Most Innovative Business People' and is an early-stage tech investor/advisor for over 50 companies, including Uber, Facebook, Twitter, Shopify, Duolingo, and Alibaba.

name: Tim Ferriss is recognized by Fast Company as one of the 'Most Innovative Busines
content: Tim Ferriss is recognized by Fast Company as one of the 'Most Innovative Business People' and is an early-stage tech investor/advisor for over 50 companies, including Uber, Facebook, Twitter, Shopify, Duolingo, and Alibaba.

payload.content: Tim Ferriss is the author of five #1 New York Times and Wall Street Journal bestsellers: The 4-Hour Workweek, The 4-Hour Body, The 4-Hour Chef, Tools of Titans, and Tribe of Mentors.

name: Tim Ferriss is the author of five #1 New York Times and Wall Street Journal best
content: Tim Ferriss is the author of five #1 New York Times and Wall Street Journal bestsellers: The 4-Hour Workweek, The 4-Hour Body, The 4-Hour Chef, Tools of Titans, and Tribe of Mentors.

payload.content: Tim Ferriss's podcast, The Tim Ferriss Show, has surpassed one billion downloads and has been selected for 'Best of Apple Podcasts' for three consecutive years, leading media outlets like The Observer to dub him 'the Oprah of audio'.

name: Tim Ferriss's podcast, The Tim Ferriss Show, has surpassed one billion downloads
content: Tim Ferriss's podcast, The Tim Ferriss Show, has surpassed one billion downloads and has been selected for 'Best of Apple Podcasts' for three consecutive years, leading media outlets like The Observer to dub him 'the Oprah of audio'.
